ValidationRule.description: The linked grantee report must be linked to this assessment's linked proposal, and both must belong to the linked account.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Grantee_Report__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Proposal__c)), Proposal__c <> Grantee_Report__r.Proposal__c ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Proposal__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Account__c)), Account__c <> Proposal__r.Account__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The linked grantee report must be linked to this assessment's linked proposal, and both must belong to the linked account.
